      • connect

        public void connect​(Player player)

      • reconnect

        public void reconnect​(Player player)
        Method called by the network layer when a reconnection is made. It notifies all the clients that the player is back online, and then it checks whether the game can start, and in case it creates the new game
        Parameters:
        player - The Player that logged in

      • canConnect

        public boolean canConnect()
        Returns:
        True iif the game is not started and the number of player is below the maximum

      • isGameStarted

        public boolean isGameStarted()

      • logout

        public void logout​(Player player)
        Method called by the network layer when a logout is made. It notifies all the clients that the player is not playing. If the number of playeris below the minimum (3 player by default) it resets the Timer that controls the time before starting and terminates the game if started.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player that logged out

      • bind

        public SlaveController bind​(Player player,
                            ServerInterface network)
        This function is called by the network layer upon receiving the first connection from a User
        Returns:
        the SlaveController all further calls by the client need to be addressed to

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] str)

      • resolveEffect

        public void resolveEffect​(SlaveController responsible,
                          java.util.List<Effect> effects,
                          java.lang.Runnable onResolved)
        Called only as the last statement of a new thread
        Parameters:
        responsible - the SlaveController which started it all (redundant)
        effects - (the list of effects)
        onResolved - (When I finish the list of effects run this function) If I call a slave controller function in between then I will have to call it and pass a runnable that will:
